data: `minecraft:behavior.fertilize_farm_block` allows the mob to search within an area for a growable crop block. If found, the mob will use any available fertilizer in their inventory on the crop. This goal will not execute if the mob does not have a fertilizer item in its inventory.

data.Name: goal_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached it's target position.

data.Name: max_fertilizer_usage
data.Description: The maximum number of times the mob will use fertilzer on the target block.

data.Name: search_cooldown_max_seconds
data.Description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the goal can take before searching again. The time is chosen between 0 and this number.

data.Name: search_count
data.Description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the mob will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

data.Name: search_height
data.Description: The Height in blocks the mob will search within to find a valid target position.

data.Name: search_range
data.Description: The distance in blocks the mob will search within to find a valid target position.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this Goal.
